item.title: BNB Treasury Company BNC Increases Holding by 38,888 BNB, Approximately $33 Million
item.description: On September 2nd, BNB Treasury Company CEA Industries Inc. (Nasdaq: BNC) announced that it has raised its holdings by 38,888 BNB, with an approximate value of $33 million. Currently, its total BNB holdings amount to 388,888 BNB, approximately $330 million.CEA Industries indicated that it intends to hold 1% of the total BNB supply by the end of 2025.

item.title: PublicAI has announced a partnership with Chainlink, causing PUBLIC to surge over 39% in half an hour.
item.description: On September 2nd, the decentralized AI data platform PublicAI announced a partnership with the Oracle Network Chainlink in order to enhance its data validation and distribution capabilities.Meanwhile, PublicAI announced a token buyback of 2 million, which led to the token PUBLIC surging by 39% within half an hour and is now trading at $0.073.

item.title: Yunfeng Financial has announced the purchase of 10,000 ETH to establish an Ethereum asset reserve.
item.description: On September 2nd, the Hong Kong-listed company CF Benchmarks (00376.HK) announced that the company's board of directors has given the green light to the purchase of ETH on the open market as a reserve asset. As of the announcement date, the group has purchased a total of 10,000 ETH on the open market, with a total investment cost (including fees and expenses) of $44 million. The funds used for this purchase are from the group's internal cash reserves, and the purchased ETH is classified as investment assets in the group's financial statements.

item.title: Artificial Intelligence Blockchain Startup Kite Completes $18 Million Series A Funding Round, Lead by PayPal and General Catalyst
item.description: On September 2nd, as reported by Fortune, the artificial intelligence blockchain startup Kite announced the completion of a $18 million Series A financing round. This round was led by PayPal and General Catalyst, and it also involved the participation of 8 venture capitalists (VCs), Samsung Next, and Alumni Ventures.The co-founder and CEO of Kite declined to disclose the valuation of the startup. Additionally, it was not revealed whether this financing round was purely equity financing or token-based convertible securities.

item.title: SharpLink increased its holding by 39,008 ETH at an average price of $4,531, surpassing a total holding of 837,000 ETH.
item.description: On September 2nd, the second-largest treasury company of Ethereum, SharpLink (SBET), announced that it has increased its holdings by an average price of approximately $4,531 and acquired 39,008 ETH. As a result, its total holding has reached 837,230 ETH, which is worth approximately $3.6 billion.Since its launch on June 2nd, it has received a total of 2,318 ETH in staking rewards. Additionally, it has a remaining cash balance of over $71.6 million that has not yet been deployed.

item.title: Pre-market Trading: US Stock Index Futures Weaken, Nasdaq Futures Down Nearly 1%
item.description: On September 2nd, based on market data, the pre-market trading of the three major US stock index futures is in a downtrend. The Nasdaq futures is down by nearly 1%.

item.title: ETHZilla plans to deploy around $100 million worth of Ethereum to EtherFi.
item.description: On September 2nd, ETHZilla Corporation, a US-listed company, announced today that it intends to allocate approximately $100 million worth of Ethereum to the EtherFi liquidity restaking protocol in order to enhance its treasury yield. The company currently possesses 102,246 ETH, with a total value of approximately $456 million, and the average acquisition price is $3,948.72.

item.title: Drin Holdings Subscribes to Asseto Equity and Pengu Software Shares, Plans to Launch RWA Digital Asset Platform
item.description: September 2nd, the Hong Kong-listed company Delin Holdings issued a supplementary announcement. It was disclosed that the company has subscribed to the equity of Asseto Holding Limited. Additionally, the management fund of the group has subscribed to shares of Pangu Software Pte Ltd.Delin Holdings stated that the post-transaction valuation of the equity subscription in Asseto is $40 million, with the quantity of Class A common shares reaching 77,352 shares. The subscription amount for Pangu Software Pte Ltd is $1 million. Both parties will jointly establish a digital asset platform that covers the tokenization of real-world assets (RWA) in both the virtual and physical worlds.

item.title: Strategy Announces Purchase of 4,048 Bitcoins
item.description: On September 2nd, it was announced by Strategy that it had augmented its holdings by 4,048 bitcoins. The average purchase price was $110,981. Currently, Strategy holds a grand total of 636,505 bitcoins.

item.title: U.S. publicly traded company Hyperscale Data will add approximately $20 million worth of Bitcoin to its balance sheet.
item.description: On September 2nd, as per the Associated Press, the publicly traded U.S. company Hyperscale Data (GPUS) declared that it is going to add approximately $20 million worth of Bitcoin to its balance sheet.It is important to note that Hyperscale Data has a market capitalization of approximately $15 million.
